name: First Aid
description: At the end of battle, restore 25% HP to an ally.

name: Keen Call
description: Before an ally attacks, grant 100% critical rate for their next attack.

name: Heavy Cover
description: Before an ally is attacked, cover them with a heavy guard.

name: Shattering Pursuit
description: After attacking, inflict physical defense -25% on the target.

name: Phalanx Shift
description: When an ally is attacked, grant row of Cavalry allies +20% Attack and +40% Crit rate.

name: Penetrate
description: After attacking, inflict Physical Defense -30% on the target.

name: Eagle Eye
description: Before attacking, grant the user's next attack True Strike.

name: Impetus Stance
description: At start of battle, gain +1 AP and -50% Attack. Limited use.

name: Tailwind
description: After using a skill, grant a row of allies +10 Initiative, doubled for flying targets.

name: Relic Heal
description: Restore HP to an ally and grant HP regeneration.

name: Binding Guard
description: User's next attack will inflict Guard Seal.

name: Mighty Shield
description: Negate the next damage dealt to an ally.

name: Stun Cure
description: Remove Stun from an ally and restore 10% of target's HP.

name: Bear's Den
description: At start of battle, grant +20% Phys Def to all allies, and +50% Guard Rate to all bestial allies. Limited use.

name: Heavy Alignment
description: At start of battle, grants a row of allies buffs based on the number of armored targets. Limited use.

name: Quick Impetus
description: Allow an ally to act again and grants +1 AP.

name: Sanguine Conferral
description: Add 50 magic potency to ally's next attack, ally regains HP equal to 50% of damage dealt by attack.

name: Magic Barrier
description: Negate next magic damage dealt to an ally and negates afflictions.

name: Guarding Impetus
description: After guarding an attack, gain +1 AP.

name: Blind Cure
description: Remove Blindness from an ally and restore 10% of target's HP.

name: Healing Pursuit
description: After an ally is healed, restore minor HP, can heal 150% above max HP.

name: Counter
description: Counterattack a single enemy.

name: Dynamic Glide
description: Evade a single hit and gain +20% Phys Atk.

name: War Cry
description: At start of battle, gain +20% Phys Atk. Limited use.

name: Powerful Call
description: Grants +30% Phys Atk to ally's next attack.

name: Diurnal Impetus
description: After using an active skill, gain +20% Mag. Atk. and an additional +1 AP during the day.

name: Quick Guard
description: Block an attack with a Medium Guard.

name: Quick Barrier
description: Reduce damage taken by an ally by 50%.

name: Freeze Cure
description: Remove Freeze from an ally and restore 10% of target's HP.

name: Poison Cure
description: Remove Poison from an ally and restore 10% of target's HP.

name: Cursed Impetus
description: When debuffed, gain +1 AP.

name: Nocturnal Impetus
description: After using an active skill, gain +20% Mag Atk and an additional +1 AP at night.

name: United Front
description: Grant buff based on number of enemies minus number of allies.

name: Sorcerous Connection
description: Lower your Mag Attack by -50% to raise an ally's Mag Attack by +50%.

name: Flame Conferral
description: Add a 50 potency magic attack and burn to ally's next attack.

name: Frost Conferral
description: Add a 50 potency magic attack and freeze to ally's next attack.

name: Inspiration
description: Ally's next attack gains +30% Atk, +50% Crit Dmg and -50 Accuracy.

name: Reinforce
description: Allow an ally to act without consuming AP.

name: Grave Impetus
description: Grants user +1 AP when ally dies.

name: Guarding Fighter
description: When you guard an attack, gain +20% Phys Attack and +30% Crit Damage.

name: Aerial Wing
description: Make next attack a Truestrike and grant +20% Attack if at max Health.

name: Phantom Step
description: Evade the next attack received.

name: Passive Gift
description: When ally uses a passive, grant +1 PP.

name: Party Aid
description: At end of battle, restore 25% HP to all allies.

name: Banishing Pursuit
description: Follow up attack that removes all of target's buffs.

name: Hastened Action
description: At start of battle, grant ally max initiative, cannot target self. Limited use.

name: Hastened Cast
description: At start of battle, grants an ally max initiative. Limited use.

name: Recast
description: After using a magic attack, use same magic attack again.

name: Magic Counter
description: Counterattack with magical damage.

name: Nimble Fighter
description: When you evade an attack, gain +20% Phys Atk and +30% Crit Damage.

name: Quick Heal
description: Restore HP to one ally.

name: Vanitas
description: Magical counterattack that inflicts Blind and Poison.

name: Wide Pursuit
description: Follow up attack on a row of enemies.

name: Guard Cure
description: Remove Guard Seal from an ally and restore 10% of target's HP.

name: Toughness
description: When attacked, gain a buff that lets you endure one fatal blow.

name: Pursuit
description: Follow up attack.

name: Fire Cure
description: Remove Burn from an ally and restore 10% of target's HP.

name: Celestial Light
description: Unleash its true power amidst a sea of miasma.

name: Wing Rest
description: At end of battle, recover 25% HP, double recovery if afflicted.

name: Passive Cure
description: Remove Passive Seal from an ally and restore 10% of target's HP.

name: Hawk Eye
description: Make next attack Truestrike and Critical.

name: Quick Cure
description: Remove all debuffs from an ally, grants immunity to one debuff.

name: Hastened Shatter
description: At start of battle, attack and inflict Phys Def -50%. Limited use.

name: Quick Action
description: At start of battle, grants an ally +15 initiative, cannot target self. Limited use.

name: Grant Evade
description: Allow an ally to evade one hit.

name: Evade
description: Evade a single hit.

name: Thunderous Conferral
description: Add a 50 potency magic attack and stun to ally's next attack.

name: Nocturnal Evade
description: Evade a single hit, gain +1 PP at night.

name: Vengeful Impetus
description: After being attacked, grant +1 AP.

name: Dawn Horn
description: At start of battle, grant all allies immunity to stun and +20% Guard Rate. Limited use.

name: Aerial Alignment
description: Grants a row of allies buffs based on the number of flying targets. Limited use.

name: Wolf Pack
description: At start of battle, grant +20% Phys Atk to all allies and +50% Crit Rate to all bestial allies. Limited use.

name: Ground Counter
description: Counterattack with +100 potency vs. cavalry.

name: Self-Care
description: Remove debuffs from self.

name: Hastened Charge
description: Immediately activate one charge attack.

name: Sanguine Pursuit
description: Follow up after an ally attacks, recovers HP equal to 50% of damage dealt, +1 PP vs afflicted targets.

name: Eye of the Warrior Princess
description: At start of battle, inflicts Attack -20% and Initiative -10 on all enemies. Limited use.

name: Painbringer
description: When attacked, grants user +1 AP, +20% Attack and +10 Initiative.

name: Scornful Dead
description: Force all enemies to focus attacks on user, user evades the next 2 hits. Limited use.

name: Evil Cover
description: Cover one ally with Medium Guard, steals 1 PP from that ally.

name: Dark Step
description: Before being attacked, evade a hit and grant user +25 Evasion.

name: Dark Conferral
description: Add magic damage (50 potency) and blindness to an ally's next attack.

name: Cursed Gaol
description: When an enemy uses an attack, inflicts -50% attack and Critical Seal.

name: Ominous Wall
description: Grants a buff that negates one attack to all allies. Limited use.

name: Advance Cover
description: Cover an ally with Medium Guard, grants user +1 AP.

name: Phantom Counter
description: Counterattack with true strike, inflicts burn and removes all buffs.

name: Parting Death
description: At end of battle, attack a single enemy, inflicts Deathblow if target has 50% HP or less.

name: Heavy Guard
description: Block an enemy attack with Heavy Guard.

name: Wild Kick
description: Follow up attack, inflicts Stun and Guard Seal.

name: Hawk Eye
description: Before attacking, grant self Truestrike and Guaranteed Critical.

name: Curing Heal
description: After ally is hit, restore minor HP and remove all debuffs. MISSING: Hit rate info.

name: Rage of the Faeries
description: Attacks at start of battle, inflicts stun and grants +1 Faerie. Limited use.

name: Elemental Impetus
description: After using an active skill, gain +1 AP and +1 Faerie.

name: Boon of the Faeries
description: Restore moderate HP, grant a buff that negates a single debuff and gain +1 Faerie. Limited use. MISSING: Hit rate info.

name: Noble Guard
description: Block enemy attack with medium guard, grants 20% Defense and grants +1 PP if you have 50% Health or less.

name: Luminous Cover
description: Cover an ally with medium Guard, grants ally 20% Defense.

name: Rapid Order
description: Grant +20 Initiative to all allies. Limited use.

name: Passive Miracle
description: After receiving an ally's passive skill, restore minor HP and give +1 PP to that ally. MISSING: Hit rate info.

name: Saint's Barrier
description: Before an ally is attacked, reduce damage taken by 50% and prevent debuffs.

name: Divine Blessing
description: Grants all allies HP Regeneration and +10% Defense. Limited use.

name: Holy Barrier
description: Cover one ally and reduce damage taken by 50%, also prevents afflictions.

name: Holy Guard
description: Block an enemy attack with Medium Guard, prevent debuffs.

name: Pursuit
description: Follow up attack.

name: Guard Order
description: Before ally attacked, grant +100% Guard Rate for one attack.

name: Sniping Order
description: Before an ally attacks, makes next attack Truestrike.

name: Eagle Eye
description: User's next attack is Truestrike.

name: Triple Counter
description: Counterattack after enemy attacks you with an active skill.

name: Snow-White Strike
description: Follow up attack, inflicts Freeze, +100 potency vs frozen targets.

name: Maiden's Hammer
description: Counterattack with true strike, potency increases the less HP the user has up to +100.

name: Iron Veil
description: Grants +50% Guard rate and +30% Phys Def at start of battle. Limited use.

name: Undying Will
description: Before using an attacking skill, boost attack potency based on HP lost (up to +100). Gain ability to survive one fatal blow.

name: Bulk Up
description: Recover 40% HP after being hit.

name: Wide Counter
description: Counterattacks a row of enemies when hit. MISSING: Potency info.

name: Berserk
description: Consume all PP to gain 1 AP and survive one fatal blow.

name: Vengeance
description: When attacked, gain 20% Attack and 20% Defense (stacks). Grant +1 PP if you are below 50% HP.

name: Sanguine Arts
description: When you use an active skill, recover HP equal to 50% of the damage dealt.

name: Demonic Pact
description: After using a skill sacrifice 25% HP to regain +1 AP.

name: Quick Guard
description: Block an attack with Medium Guard.

name: Cavalier Call
description: Grants Cavalry allies in user's row +20% Attack (effect stacks).

name: Knight's Pursuit
description: Follow up attack after a cavalier ally attacks.

name: Wing Rest
description: Recover 25% HP at the end of combat, double recovery if afflicted. MISSING: Hit rate info.

name: Feathering
description: Grant allies in your row +15 Initiative when attacking.

name: Gryphon Glide
description: Evade 1 ranged attack, grants self +1 AP.

name: Magic Barrier
description: Negate the next Magic damage dealt to an ally and prevents afflictions.

name: Holy Guard
description: Block a physical attack with Medium Guard, prevents debuffs.

name: Row Barrier
description: Negate the next Magic damage dealt to a row of allies and prevents afflictions.

name: Ground Counter
description: Counterattack, +100 potency vs. Cavalry.

name: Deflect
description: Negate Melee damage for one hit, grants user +20 Evasion.

name: Dragon's Roar
description: Reduce Initiative by 20 for all enemies. Limited use.
